properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 7:58PM CST until January 29 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...

Big Muddy River near Murphysboro affecting Jackson County

.River levels will continue to slowly fall along the Big Muddy River.
Minor flooding is forecast to end at Murphysboro by the middle of
next week.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Big Muddy River near Murphysboro
* until Wednesday afternoon.
* At  7:30 PM Thursday the stage was 24.0 feet.
* Flood Stage is 22.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue falling below flood stage
by Wednesday morning.
* Impact...At 24.0 Feet...Some minor flooding in South 3rd & Division
Plum Street area.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
